channel.title: first on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in first on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-15
item.description: Pixel will be able to stream Android apps to your Chromebook or PC (4 minute read) The first Android 13 Developer Preview built for Pixel phones includes two Cross Device service apps dedicated to connecting Pixels to other devices.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-14
item.description: Android 13 leaks: More Material You options, opt-in to app notifications (7 minute read) Android 13’s first developer previews won’t be out until at least March, but several sources have already begun leaking its new features.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-19
item.description: Apple reportedly wants to launch a self-driving EV in 2025 with a custom chip (3 minute read) Apple has reportedly accelerated its timeline for Project Titan, its secretive autonomous electric car project.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-16
item.description: How to Watch the World’s First All-Civilian Spaceflight Aboard a SpaceX Ship (3 minute read) Inspiration4 is set to launch on September 15.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-26
item.description: OnlyFans says it will no longer ban porn in stunning U-turn after user backlash (1 minute read) OnlyFans has suspended its plans to ban pornography.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-20
item.description: Peloton plans to launch an in-app video game where you pedal to control a rolling wheel (2 minute read) Lanebreak is Peloton’s new in-app video game that involves riders changing their cadence and resistance to meet goals and control an on-screen rolling wheel.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-14
item.description: Amazon details new warehouse robots, ‘Ernie’ and ‘Bert’ (2 minute read) Amazon is testing out two new robots, Ernie and Bert, to try to reduce strenuous movements for workers.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-21
item.description: Snap’s new Spectacles let you see the world in augmented reality (4 minute read) Snap has unveiled its first true augmented reality glasses.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-06
item.description: Yahoo Answers will be shut down forever on May 4th (3 minute read) Yahoo Answers will shut down on May 4.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-01
item.description: Apple adds two brand new Siri voices and will no longer default to a female or male voice in iOS (3 minute read) Siri will no longer default to a female voice in English.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-31
item.description: Snap Plans Hardware Push With AR Spectacles, Drone (1 minute read) Snap’s next-gen Spectacles will be able to layer Snapchat lenses onto the surrounding environment without using a smartphone’s camera.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-29
item.description: Google is testing Memory, an upgrade for Assistant to ‘save and find everything’ (2 minute read) Memory is a new feature for Google Assistant that uses a digital locker to store things like to-do lists, notes, reading lists, images, and more.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-04
item.description: Myanmar internet providers block Facebook services after government order (2 minute read) Internet providers in Myanmar blocked access to Facebook and its related services after military leaders seized power in a coup.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-16
item.description: SpaceX successfully launches second crew to space on first operational mission (4 minute read) SpaceX has successfully launched a second crew into orbit inside its Crew Dragon spacecraft.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-07
item.description: Apple’s ‘Hi, Speed’ iPhone 12 invite sparks speculation: Midnight Blue, 5G, AirTags, more (2 minute read) Apple has sent out invitations for its ‘Hi, Speed’ event on October 13th at 10 AM PT.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-24
item.description: Tesla suffers complete network outage, internal systems and connectivity features down (2 minute read) Tesla suffered a complete network outage earlier.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-07
item.description: Driving the Polestar 2, the first electric car with a brain by Google (8 minute read) The Polestar 2 is a new luxury electric vehicle from Volvo.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-02
item.description: Dating app Bumble preparing for an IPO above $6 billion (1 minute read) Bumble is preparing for an Initial Public Offering early next year, possibly seeking a valuation of between $6 billion to $8 billion.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-24
item.description: Elon Musk reveals Boring tunnels as he aims to eliminate city traffic (3 minute read) Elon Musk has revealed renders of the first commercial station being built by his tunnel-digging company.
